scripts.start-api-unix: cd api && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt && export FLASK_ENV=development && export FLASK_APP=api.py && flask run --no-debugger
scripts.start-api-windows: cd api && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt && export FLASK_ENV=development && export FLASK_APP=api.py && flask run --no-debugger
